MAIN_MESSAGE: Our engineers need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm, affecting the electricity supply in the G52 postcode area of Glasgow. This is to safely install fault finding equipment on our underground cable network for properties in Tarfside Oval and surrounding streets. We apologise for the recent interruptions which may have affected your electricity in recent months. We believe there is an underlying cable fault on our underground low voltage network affecting premises at Tarfside Gardens and Tarfside Oval. In order to install the fault finding equipment and mitigate further interruptions and allow us to locate the fault then repair it we require to install smart fuses. To do so your property may be affected by this and we expect power to be back on by 1:15pm . We apologise for the inconvenience and will make every effort to contact you if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:28pm on the 11th of December 2020.
